alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Garden; Grant; Hooker; Keith; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:43PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORM OUTFLOW WINDS WILL IMPACT ARTHUR...SOUTH CENTRAL CHERRY... GRANT...NORTHEASTERN KEITH...HOOKER...NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN... NORTHEASTERN GARDEN...NORTHWESTERN LOGAN...MCPHERSON AND THOMAS COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM CDT/645 PM MDT/... At 642 PM CDT/542 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds originating from thunderstorms along a line extending from 22 miles north of Mullen to near Whitman to 16 miles southwest of Ashby. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mullen, Thedford, Arthur, Tryon, Hyannis, Seneca, Swan Lake, Whitman, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Duluth, Swede Lake, Flatts, Cogill Lake, Marsh Flat, Green Lake, Bucktail Lake, Bourquim Hill, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Three Mile Lake and Pratt Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 139 and 221. Highway 61 between mile markers 113 and 168. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 208. Highway 97 between mile markers 32 and 92. Highway 83 between mile markers 134 and 159. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Garden; Grant; Hooker; Keith; Logan; McPherson
